data.text: Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Kraisɨn adarasi, God uaghan Uan Nguibamɨn mangasa, a ian dia. Ia deravɨra Iesus gɨnɨghnɨgh, e nɨghnɨzir gavgavim an ikia, egha an ziamɨn gun mɨgɨa ghaze, a God mɨsevegha amadazir abuir gumazim, egha uaghan Ofa Gamir Gumazibar Dapanim.
3:2 Dɨboboniba 12:7God anemɨsevegha ingangarir kam a ganɨngizɨ, a Godɨn gumazamiziba bagha ingari. Moses fomɨra Godɨn gumazamiziba bagha deravɨra ingarizɨ moghɨra, a ingari.

3:3 Sekaraia 6:12; Matyu 16:18E fo, gumazir dɨpenimɨn ingarim, a ziar ekiam isi, ezɨ an ziar ekiam, an dɨpenimɨn ziar ekiam gafira. Ezɨ kamaghɨra God ziar ekiam Iesus ganɨngi, ezɨ an ziar ekiam, Mosesɨn ziar ekiam gafira.
3:4 Efesus 2:10; 3:9; Hibru 1:2Ezɨ dɨpeniba bar, gumaziba dar ingari. Ezɨ Godra, a biziba bar dar ingari.
3:5 Dɨboboniba 12:7Moses a Godɨn ingangarir gumazimɨn iti, egha Godɨn akamɨn gɨn ghua Godɨn gumazamiziba bagha deravɨra ingari. A bizibar gun mɨkɨmamin ingangarim iti, akar God gɨn a mɨkɨmamiba.

3:6 Rom 5:2; Efesus 2:21-22; Kolosi 1:23; 1 Timoti 3:15; Hibru 3:14; 6:11; 1 Pita 2:5Ezɨ Krais a Godɨn Otarim, a Godɨn gumazamizibagh ativagh men ganam. Egha guizbangɨra Godɨn akamɨn gɨn ghua ingangarir kam deravɨra a gami. Eghtɨ e atiatingan koghɨva, nɨghnɨzir gavgavim ikɨva egh bizir aghuir e iniamiba e dav zuamam, egh kamaghɨn damuva, e uaghan Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn mɨn ikiam.
E Godɨn gumazamiziba, egha uaghan an dɨpenimɨn mɨn iti, kamaghɨn amizɨ, e Godɨn Duamɨn akam baragham. A kamaghɨn mɨgei:
Kamaghɨn amizɨ, kɨ bar gumazamizir kabar anɨngaghegha ghaze,
Kɨ men anɨngaghegha bar guizbangɨra akar gavgavim gamua ghaze,
Kraisɨn adarasi, ia uari bagh deravɨra gan, ian tongɨn tav nɨghnɨzir kuratam an navir averiamɨn ikɨtɨ a nɨghnɨzir gavgavim ategh, akɨrim ragh Angamɨra Itir God gasan markɨ.

Ezɨ ia kamaghɨn damuan markɨ, ia kamaghɨn damu, ia zurara dughiabar ia vaghvagh Godɨn gumazamizir igharaziba ko ia, akar aghuim uari danɨng uarir akurvagh egh uan naviba gavgavim dar anɨng. Kamaghɨn arazir kuram tav gifaraghtɨ, a Godɨn gɨn zuir tuavim ateghan kogham. Godɨn Akɨnafarim ghaze, “Datɨrɨghɨn,” e fo, e datɨrɨghɨn ingangarir kam damuam.

3:14 Hibru 3:6Ia fo, dughiar e faragha nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Godɨn itim, en nɨghnɨzir gavgavim bar gavgafi. Egh e uan nɨghnɨzir gavgavibar amutɨ da gavgavigh ikɨ maghɨra mangɨ dughiar e ovengamimɨn otogham. E kamaghɨn damuva, e bar Krais ko poroghɨv ikɨ a ko ingar ikiam.
3:15 Onger Akaba 95:7-8; Hibru 3:7-8E fo, Godɨn Akɨnafarim kamaghɨn mɨgei:
Fomɨra te Godɨn tiarim baregha, an gɨn zuir puvatɨ, egha an akam batosi? Kar gumazamizir Moses inigha Isipɨn ghueziba, meraram arazir kam gami.

3:17 Onger Akaba 106:26; 1 Korin 10:10; Jut 1:5Ezɨ God 40plan azenibar ten anɨngaghe? A gumazamizir arazir kurabagh amiziba, me gumazamiziba puvatɨzir danganimɨn ariaghirezir gumaziba, merara, a men anɨngaghe.

3:18 Godɨn Araziba 1:34-35; Hibru 3:11God fomɨra guizbangɨra akar gavgavim akɨra ghaze, “Me nan aghuvsazir danganimɨn aven mangan kogham.” Akar kam, a te ganɨngi? Kar gumazamizir an akam barazir puvatɨziba. A me baghvɨra mɨgei.
3:19 Hibru 4:6Kamaghɨn e fo, gumazir kaba me nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Godɨn ikian aghua. Ezɨ bizir kam bagha me Godɨn aghuvsazir danganimɨn aven mangan ibura.
